introduction_japanese: 冒険は、旅行やファンタジーの話、ゲーム、挑戦の話、少しあぶない計画についての会話でよく使う言葉です。
introduction_english: The noun and suru-verb ぼうけん is commonly used in conversations about travel, fantasy stories, games, taking on challenges, risky plans, and thrilling experiences.
meanings: venture which is unlikely to succeed
meaning_explanation_japanese: 「冒険」は、新しい場所に行ったり、知らないことに挑戦したりして、わくわくする体験のことです。また、うまくいくか分からない、少しあぶないやり方のことも言います。「冒険をする」のように使えます。
meaning_explanation_english: The word ぼうけん means an adventure, like going to new places or trying unknown things. It also means a risky attempt that may fail. You can use it as a noun or with する as a verb.

common_words: 冒頭 (ぼうとう): beginning; opening
冒す (おかす): to risk; to contract (a disease)
険しい (けわしい): steep; severe

kanji_explanation: The first kanji means to dare or to risk. You can hear it in ぼうとう, the opening part of a talk or text, where something is put in front. It also appears in おかす, to risk or to expose oneself, showing the idea of facing danger on purpose. The second kanji means steep or dangerous. It shows up in きけん, meaning danger, and in けわしい, meaning steep or harsh. In these words it gives the feeling of something hard to pass and risky.
synonyms: 探検 : たんけん : exploration
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word ぼうけん is たんけん. たんけん focuses on exploring and investigating new places or things, often with learning in mind, while ぼうけん adds more risk and thrill.
antonyms: 安全 : あんぜん : safety
無難 : ぶなん : safe; risk-free
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word ぼうけん are あんぜん and ぶなん. あんぜん means safe with no danger, the opposite of taking risks in ぼうけん. ぶなん means playing it safe to avoid trouble, also the opposite feeling of trying risky things in ぼうけん.

example_sentences.kanji: 私たちは冒険の旅に出ます。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)たちは冒険(ぼうけん)の旅(たび)に出(で)ます。

translations.EN: We are going on an adventure.
translations.VI: Chúng ta sắp bước vào một cuộc phiêu lưu.
translations.TL: Kami ay pupunta sa isang pakikipagsapalaran.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်တို့သည် စွန့်စားမှုတစ်ခုကို သွားနေပါသည်။
translations.HI: हम एक साहसिक यात्रा पर जा रहे हैं।

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は新しい町で冒険をした。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は新(あたら)しい町(まち)で冒険(ぼうけん)をした。

translations.EN: He had an adventure in his new town.
translations.ID: Dia mengalami petualangan di kota barunya.
translations.ES: Tuvo una aventura en su nueva ciudad.
translations.VI: Anh ấy đã có một cuộc phiêu lưu ở thị trấn mới của mình.
translations.FR: Il a vécu une aventure dans sa nouvelle ville.
translations.NE: उसको नयाँ शहरमा एउटा साहसिक कार्य भयो।
translations.BN: তার নতুন শহরে তার একটা অ্যাডভেঞ্চার হয়েছিল।
translations.ZH: 他在新城镇经历了一次冒险。
translations.TL: Siya ay nagkaroon ng isang pakikipagsapalaran sa kanyang bagong bayan.
translations.MY: သူ့မြို့သစ်မှာ စွန့်စားခန်းတစ်ခုရှိတယ်။
translations.HI: अपने नये शहर में उसे एक रोमांचक अनुभव हुआ।
translations.AR: لقد خاض مغامرة في مدينته الجديدة.
translations.FA: او در شهر جدیدش ماجراجویی‌هایی داشت.

example_sentences.kanji: 今日は小さな冒険を始めよう。
example_sentences.furigana: 今日(きょう)は小(ちい)さな冒険(ぼうけん)を始(はじ)めよう。

translations.EN: Let's start a little adventure today.
translations.ID: Mari kita mulai petualangan kecil hari ini.
translations.VI: Hãy cùng bắt đầu một cuộc phiêu lưu nhỏ ngày hôm nay.
translations.NE: आज एउटा सानो साहसिक कार्य सुरु गरौं।
translations.BN: আজ থেকে একটা ছোট্ট অভিযান শুরু করা যাক।
translations.ZH: 今天我们开始一次小冒险吧。
translations.TL: Magsimula tayo ng isang maliit na pakikipagsapalaran ngayon.
translations.MY: ဒီနေ့ စွန့်စားခန်းလေးတစ်ခု စလိုက်ရအောင်။
translations.HI: आइये आज एक छोटा सा साहसिक कार्य शुरू करें।
translations.FA: بیایید امروز یک ماجراجویی کوچک را شروع کنیم.

example_sentences.furigana: その計画(けいかく)は冒険的(ぼうけんてき)だ。

translations.VI: Kế hoạch này khá mạo hiểm.
translations.MY: အစီအစဉ်သည် စွန့်စားခန်းဖြစ်သည်။

example_sentences.furigana: それは危険(きけん)な冒険(ぼうけん)だ。

translations.VI: Đây là một cuộc phiêu lưu nguy hiểm.
translations.NE: यो एउटा खतरनाक साहसिक कार्य हो।
translations.TL: Ito ay isang mapanganib na pakikipagsapalaran.
translations.MY: ဒါဟာ အန္တရာယ်ရှိတဲ့ စွန့်စားမှုတစ်ခုပါ။
translations.HI: यह एक खतरनाक साहसिक कार्य है.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼女は冒険小説が好きだ。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)は冒険小説(ぼうけんしょうせつ)が好(す)きだ。

translations.ES: A ella le gustan las novelas de aventuras.
translations.VI: Cô ấy thích tiểu thuyết phiêu lưu.
translations.MY: သူမသည် စွန့်စားခန်းဝတ္ထုများကို နှစ်သက်သည်။
translations.FA: او رمان‌های ماجراجویی را دوست دارد.

risky attempt.MY: အန္တရာယ်ရှိသောကြိုးစားမှု
EN: venture which is unlikely to succeed

english_definitions: venture which is unlikely to succeed
